entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:25 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 06:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: NW 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8 except minus 4 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 8 except minus 4 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain showers in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 30 December 2022
